title: Looking for a team or club to farm S-chest
body:
Hi there,

As the title says, I am looking for a team or club to farm S-chest.
The idea is we play as a 2,3,4 or 5-person team in normal with one of us playing main champ, while the rest plays any champ they dont main.
The main champ player get S, the rest get S as well.

Any rank does not matter as long as we can do this consistently.

Please add me in game: Ronystark
